column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: 8 sex workers in Daun Penh were arrested in a continuing ------crack down------ on prostitutes around the Wat Phnom area. There were sent to the Ministry of Social Affairs------The above operation took place between 8pm-2am on Tuesday July 9-Wednesday 10  on Route 92. 94. 96 and surrounding Wat Phnom.------Three ladyboys and five women were picked up in the operation.------ Phnom Penh Municipal Police said the crackdown will continue. ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/318075
